sentences.en: a child with a happy, easy-going nature
sentences.cn: 个性开朗、容易相处的孩子

sentences.en: A garden is, at best, a holding operation against nature.
sentences.cn: 花园充其量不过是抗拒自然的一时之法。

sentences.en: a week at home would be in the nature of a holiday.
sentences.cn: 在家里待一周和度假没什么区别。

sentences.en: Capitalist society is by its very nature unstable.
sentences.cn: 从本质而言，资本主义社会是不稳定的。

sentences.en: Charlotte planned to appeal to his better nature.
sentences.cn: 夏洛特打算求助于他善良的一面。

sentences.en: Conservationists are mostly wedded to preserving diversity in nature.
sentences.cn: 自然环境保护主义者大多致力于保持物种的多样性。

sentences.en: Disease is nature’s way of keeping the population down.
sentences.cn: 疾病是大自然控制人口的方法。

sentences.en: He just published a paper in the journal Nature analyzing the fires.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚在《自然》杂志上发表了一篇分析火灾的论文。

sentences.en: He was beginning to enjoy the beauties of nature.
sentences.cn: 他开始享受大自然之美。

sentences.en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentences.cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

sentences.en: His was a utopian vision of nature in its purest form.
sentences.cn: 他对大自然怀有一种极为纯粹的乌托邦式看法。

sentences.en: I fell in love with him because of his kind nature.
sentences.cn: 我爱上他，是因为他秉性善良。

sentences.en: I tried appealing to his better nature (= his feelings of kindness ) but he wouldn’t agree to help us.
sentences.cn: 我想唤起他的善良本性，但他就是不同意帮助我们。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I have to answer a call of nature.
sentences.cn: 抱歉我要去趟洗手间。

sentences.en: in the nature of things, old people spend much more time indoors.
sentences.cn: 当然，老年人在室内时间多得多。

sentences.en: it is in the nature of things that the majority of music prizes get set up for performers rather than composers.
sentences.cn: 大部分的音乐奖项理所当然是为演奏者而不是为作曲者设立的。

sentences.en: It was in the nature of a debate rather than an argument.
sentences.cn: 那更像是一场辩论，而不是争吵。

sentences.en: nature conservation
sentences.cn: 自然保护

sentences.en: Of course she’s jealous - it’s only human nature (= the feelings and ways of behav­ing that all people have ).
sentences.cn: 她当然嫉妒——这是人的天性。

sentences.en: One could argue that smoking, by its very nature, is addictive.
sentences.cn: 有人可能认为抽烟从本质上说就具有成瘾性。

sentences.en: Rowe does a very clever riff on the nature of prejudice.
sentences.cn: 罗就偏见的本质讲了一番很精辟的话。

sentences.en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentences.cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentences.en: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed.
sentences.cn: 实质性证据的性质和可用性毋庸讨论。

sentences.en: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentences.cn: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

sentences.en: They drove into the mountains for a weekend of nature study.
sentences.cn: 他们周末开车进山去观察自然。

sentences.en: We grew up in the countryside, surrounded by the beauties of nature.
sentences.cn: 我们在乡村长大，周围是美丽的大自然。

words.tran_cn: 自然的；物质的；天生的；不做作的
自然的（等于naturalistic）；自然主义的；博物学的
自然的；自然主义的；博物学的
归化的；入籍的；[动] 自然化的；驯化的
自然的事情；白痴；本位音
自然主义；本能行动；自然论
自然主义者；博物学者；（英）动物标本剥制者；买卖玩赏动物的商人
对自然现象的崇拜；裸体主义
使自然化；接受…入国籍；采纳（naturalize的过去式和过去分词）
大自然,自然界,自然力,自然体系

phrases.tran_cn: 不合常情的，反常的；邪恶的
生态平衡；自然平衡；自然生态平衡；自然均衡
(基督教神学)未得神恩的有罪状态
自然保护；自然保育；自然保持

trans.tran_en: everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather
everything in the physical world that is not controlled by humans, such as wild plants and animals, earth and rocks, and the weather
